mapper.select: select cs_no, title, content, member_id, dt, hit, orgno, groupodr, grouplyr, ctgry from csboard where ctgry = #{ctgry} and member_id = #{memberId} order by orgno desc, groupodr asc
select cs_no, title, content, member_id, dt, hit, orgno, groupodr, grouplyr, ctgry from csboard where cs_no = #{csNo}
mapper.insert:
select case when max(cs_no) is null then 1 else max(cs_no) + 1 end as id from csboard
insert into csboard values(#{csNo}, #{title}, #{content}, #{memberId}, sysdate, 0, #{csNo}, 0, 0, #{ctgry})

select case when max(cs_no) is null then 1 else max(cs_no) + 1 end as id from csboard
insert into csboard values(#{csNo}, 'RE:' || #{title}, #{content}, #{memberId}, sysdate, 0, #{orgNo}, #{groupOdr}+1, #{groupLyr}+1, 'QNA')
mapper.update: update csboard set groupodr = groupodr + 1 where orgno = #{orgNo} and groupodr > #{groupOdr}
